Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On Rt. 644 in the County of Giles, in the vicinity of Market Rd; Rt. 645N/S (Giles County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Weather Incident - Standing Water - Closed

Description: On Rt. 663 in the County of Montgomery, in the vicinity of Hawley Rd; Snapdragon Ln; Spaulding Rd; Rt. 720E/W (Montgomery County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Weather Incident - Standing Water - Closed

Description: On Rt. 673 East in the County of Fairfax, in the vicinity of Hunters Crest Way; Rt. 7490N/S (Fairfax County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. Lane closures exist.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Advisory

Description: On VA-276 North in the County of Rockingham, in the vicinity of E Timber Ridge Rd; W Timber Ridge Rd; Rt. 668E/W (Rockingham County), motorists can expect potential delays due to a vehicle crash.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 160.7 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On VA-7 in the County of Fairfax, in the vicinity of Rt. 2724E/W (Fairfax County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The east left lane, left center lane, and right center lane are closed. The west left lane, left center lane, right center lane, and right lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
